body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Deals Inc. My name is Joe Clark. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Ruth Cox.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Ruth. To assist you better, may I ask for your phone number and email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, one two three, four five six seven. And my email address is ruth dot cox at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Ruth. One one zero zero, I have updated your details in our system.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Is there anything else I can assist you with today, Ruth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that will be all for now. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out, Ruth. We appreciate your time. Have a great day!
